plot: During a beach trip with her granddaughter, Toet, grandma bumps into a Japanese family and her memories of the former wartime occupiers of Dutch Indonesia, are stirred.
title: Arigato
plot_es: During a beach trip with her granddaughter, Toet, grandma bumps into a Japanese family and her memories of the former wartime occupiers of Dutch Indonesia, are stirred.
